overview: Meet the International Playboys, the most charming, handsome, stylish and well-traveled adult stars in the world. Whether you prefer to make love in London, suck cock in Chicago, or fuck big bubble-butt in New York City, you better pack your bags and have your passport ready. This is one adventure you don't want to miss!
